name: Radium Rush
description:
Do you have what it takes to defeat alien enemies while skillfully flying over the world? Destroy as many alien ships as you can without hitting any obstacles and dying. Share your high-score in the comments and compare your abilities with other players!!! 

Tip: If the game runs like shit, try playing it on low or very low graphic settings. 

I made this project following the Complete Unity 3D course which you can find here.
